website_summaries.verdict: It's a very solid filet knife, but if you are looking for a more versatile tool, you may find yourself limited.
pros: A rugged tool that boasts 110 volts of power
Has a streamlined handle and five interchangeable blades
cons: Designed specifically as a filet knife

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, WON'T LAST!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this knife for a couple of months or so, and I went to use it the other day and the black button that you push to release the blades has gone limp and now just stays pushed back. So blades no longer lock into place. I thought that at this price I was buying something that would last. I was wrong. I will update with a pic soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rashid Riggins

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions - Gets really hot
customer_reviews.text: Last time out we did pretty well with 6 nice trout, 3 black drum and a sheepshead. No problem at first with the trout, but by the time we were halfway through the 3rd the handle was really hot. So we carried on manually until the trout were done. Drum and sheepshead are a little more of a challenge so we thought we'd try electronically again. Didn't know which blade to use as there's no instructions showing the best one for the fish species. After trying 4 blades and making a mess of the first drum we went back to manual.
customer_reviews.author: Rick H

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my old American Angler electric filet knife. It just wore out after 15 years of heavy use. Used this one for the first time last week and cleaned up two limits of yellow perch in no time. Love the long narrow blade for slicing the filet's off the backbone and the variety of knives make it easy to pick the right one for the job. I would recommend this kit for anyone that catches and cleans a lot of fish. Let's hope this one holds out as long as my original.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Man in Your Life
customer_reviews.text: My husband complained at Thanksgiving that he wished he had an electric knife to cut the turkey, so I thought, “great idea for a Christmas gift!” So I hunted all over and read all the reviews and decided He would like this one since he loves to fish too. Funny thing is he bought me an electric knife he thought I would want and he took that one back and kept this one!
customer_reviews.author: Joybell

customer_reviews.title: Great electric knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, sturdy electric knife. Makes short work of cutting catfish into filet and the variety of blades makes it great for many different cutting tasks such as Turkey, Ham, cutting large quantity meats into steaks or chops as well as bread and cheeses. I love that it comes with replacement blades. Only thing I would change would be the tacky bag they send with it to keep it in, even the less expensive knives usually come in an adequate storage case, the blades don't fit in the one that came with it but that is only a minor issue and in no way affects the performance of the knife
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great smooth cutting filet knife.
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a friend. I decided to give it a chance and upgrade from my current electric filet knife I had been using. It was like switching from a jack hammer to a precision instrument. Very smooth, fast, clean cuts. Comfortable and much easier to use than my other model I had been using. So far I have used it to clean crappie, walleye, and saugeye. Can't wait to try this on some of those big boned salt water fish that were always so tough.
customer_reviews.author: Ottis F. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Beware-arrived used/w-blood inside
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this splurge item to gift host on Memorial Day. Fortunately I read the reviews and made sure to look inside blade handle. Photo a bit blurred -but it was taken with handle still strapped to cardboard. Blades appeared smeared with something- not bloody though. SENDING IT BACK- betting it gets recycled/sold again. Beware
customer_reviews.author: MNM

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice, but low performance
customer_reviews.text: The positive part is that the blade set is very nice. The downside is that after 4 medium sizes walleye the handle gets warm and starts to smell like electronics that are working too hard. For the money I expected to be able to clean 30 walleye without the knife even noticing. I will be in the market for a better electric knife before the next walleye run.
customer_reviews.author: clarn42

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This knife is working great for me. I did 35 Red Ear and Blue Gill, the other afternoon. I pulse it off and on to have great control over the cutting action and it never heated up on me. Kind of expensive but I hope it lasts several years,
customer_reviews.author: mosky

customer_reviews.title: Good for cutting even slices of brisket.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Bought it as a gift for my son who does BBQ competitions. Cuts a brisket nicely. He seems happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: RetireToNevada

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I just cant seem to wear this knife out. Filleting 15-20 lbs. of fish everyday of every weekend for over a year and it's still going strong. no other knife has held up like. I ordered 2 . Have yet to use the spare.
customer_reviews.author: HOGDIVER

customer_reviews.title: Best knife ever
customer_reviews.text: I have spent hundreds of dollars on knives to filet my husbands many catches from fresh water to salt water and this knife is far better than any and all purchases combined. The video they showed is real!! The knife cuts that easily but you have to make sure you have the blades locked in place. The various blades that are included are great blades that help filet different types and size of fish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super nice for cutting any meats~! Get the longer blade also for HAM.
customer_reviews.text: Super nice for carving any meat. We use it for carving bacon and ham...as well as fish. Slices thorugh everything. We bought this item to go with the kit as we needed longer size blades for cutting hams.  The bag won't fit the long knives...but that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Brandywine

customer_reviews.title: Works great on fish
customer_reviews.text: My dad smokes a ton of fish. As in he buys between 50-100 lbs every couple of months and smokes it. He goes through hundreds, if not thousands, of trout, whitefish, walleye and salmon yearly. I got this knife for him as a gift when his fourth Rapalla knife went out. He speaks highly of this knife, and it's been going strong for about half a year.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad S

customer_reviews.title: No customer support!!!
customer_reviews.text: I paid more for this knife thinking it would last. The knife died 3 months out of the warranty window. Impossible to find customer support. Don't waist your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn R Foust

customer_reviews.title: Blades dull out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Blades dull out quickly. Poor quality. It's going back in the box and finding something else. Very discouraged. What a disappointment. Better off using a fillet knife. A dull knife is more dangerous than a sharpened one.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Thomson

customer_reviews.title: He Loves It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Husband was extremely happy with this fillet knife. Says it works great on his crappy, walleye and bluegills.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer DeHart

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my father in law as a birthday gift. Loved it and have used it several times since.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible knife.... only used twice and each time it can’t even get through 2 red fish without getting to got to handle. Has no power to cut through.
customer_reviews.author: Dorsett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect knives
customer_reviews.text: Never will use a filet knives again this is a perfect combo knives for fish and quartering out elk anilope too
customer_reviews.author: stevenmalone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than I expected!! I am ordering another one for my brother in law's birthday..
customer_reviews.author: felix garza

customer_reviews.title: Best knife money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Best knife money can buy. Works great on big Northerns cuts through the large bones with ease. Second one I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: george rogers

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! As stated in reviews, it has the power to cut through bones. I also used it for carving turkey and ham.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband & he LOVES it. Our fishing guide was using one like this earlier in the summer. He recommended it & we are very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: I think there are better electric knives out there but I have cleaned quite ...
customer_reviews.text: I think there are better electric knives out there but I have cleaned quite a few big reds and sheepshead with this knife. Not too bad except now it doesn't want to turn off after one year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Askew

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Cuts and Cuts and Cuts. Sliced Turkey and Ham for 900 people for thanksgiving. Started warming up every now and then so I would stick it in the freezer for a few minutes and cut cut cut some more. UPDATE: This item works perfectly, until it doesn't. There is apparently an ongoing issue with this item and its Nylon Gears. I would be ok with that except you cannot buy replacement parts. It has a 2 year warranty but after that it will simply be an ugly paperweight. When it wears out (and it will) there is no way to fix this very expensive tool, so because of that I would not recommend spending that much.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: How did I live w/out this? It cuts through fish like butter!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: mkoch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product ....love it for walleyes . must have works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: PAUL GEHRKE

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this knife. Blades were so flimsy it was hard to use. Also the motor got so hot that it was hard to hold, after cleaning only 15 fish. I used it once and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Jones

customer_reviews.title: great knife
customer_reviews.text: Had a berkley that was beyound bad got this for my brother and he loves it although it does get warm if used longer
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good knife. But I need a little practice. I'm sure it will get better as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: WOULD SUGGEST DON'T  BUY
customer_reviews.text: ONE OF THE WORST ELECTRIC FISHING KNIVES IHAVE EVER HAD FROM AMERICAN ANGLER. I HAVE HAD OTHER AMERICAN ANGLERS KNIVES JUST AS GOOD OR BETTER. THE MOTOR HEATS UP TO QUICKLY.IN THE PRO PROFESSIONAL. I WASTED 141.00. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS KNIFE. JUNK. I HAVE PURSHASED AMERICAN ANGLER FOR OVER 15 YEARS. I'M GOING TO WRITE AMERICAN ANGLER A LETTER ALSO. .
customer_reviews.author: william  f. haney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great knife, it pays to watch what the guides (professionals) use
customer_reviews.author: william r mueller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife
customer_reviews.text: This is the best knife ever no clue how we got by without it all these years and we fish a lot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the fish done fast
customer_reviews.text: Great fillet knife. Plenty of power and all the blades you need. Used to use a rapala rechargeable knife - no comparison to this knife.
customer_reviews.author: JudiLen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't overheat easily. I have cleaned a few hundred fish with ...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power. Doesn't overheat easily. I have cleaned a few hundred fish with it now and I love it. I never had an electric knife whose torque I could feel in my hand when I powered up. With this one I can. This knife will not back down from a fight!.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M

customer_reviews.title: I like this model a lot more than the last model
customer_reviews.text: I like this model a lot more than the last model. The blades come out much easier than the one that has a release button on each side. This one really runs great...
customer_reviews.author: edbone

customer_reviews.title: Best knife on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best filet knife I have ever seen. I use it on small breama and crappie as well as large Striper and Red Fish. The number of blades and power are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Oakley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product!!! Used once, overheated, wouldn't turn off, blades were dull!!! Absolutely horrible!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best knife on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best knife to filet with. I have tried just about all the sporting goods stores had to offer. I fine this one has a stronger motor. Satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Sider

customer_reviews.title: Don’t try to clean too many fish or they over heat.
customer_reviews.text: Gets hot and shuts down. Went through 2 of these and not happy with them for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott In Michigan

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best filet knife I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Knife gets hot.
customer_reviews.text: This knife gets really hot if you cut a lot of fish. Other than that, it is a beast.
customer_reviews.author: HemiHaley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best filet knife I have ever had in over 35 years of cleaning fish. DCR
customer_reviews.author: MDR

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought it was very well made and he liked all the different sized blades that came with this set. The only downfall was the bag which could have been 1" bigger to accommodate the longer blades; other than that, PERFECT! Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dee S.

customer_reviews.title: and he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift, and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knives
customer_reviews.text: I used to filet several different types of fish. Flounder, Redfish,, Snapper and hard to filet Sheepheads. It worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Virgil Romito

customer_reviews.title: American Angler Knife - Number 1
customer_reviews.text: I have used two other electric fillet knives, but neither one were nearly as good as the American Angler. These knives are sharper and lasted longer. The power of the Amerian was considerably better. It powered through the larger fish like a breeze. I am very satisfied! Tom Sager
customer_reviews.author: Tom's Home Repair

customer_reviews.title: Have only used the knife a couple of times and ...
customer_reviews.text: Have only used the knife a couple of times and it worked perfectly. I need more time to really rate the quality of this product, maybe next year after more use. Handle is a little awkward to hold. Doesn't seem to quite fit in the hand properly.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Peluso

customer_reviews.title: Great knife. I have bought 6 other fillet kives ...
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. I have bought 6 other fillet kives and this is by far the best. I fish for catfish mostly (some reds). This thing fillets catfish like butter. I have a fish fry a few weeks back and I fillet 75 pounds of catfish in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Yes used it to cut a chair cushion worked
customer_reviews.text: Yes used it to cut a chair cushion worked great
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Best to clean fish
customer_reviews.text: Great to filet crappie my husband says it’s the best filet knife out there for cleaning fish
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved this! He isn’t straining his wrist anymore when he cleans fish.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my son-in-law so I have no direct experience using it but he'd said he liked it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Allen E. Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Yea well I clean alot of fish ao I needed a good knife! I got 6yrs out of my last one!
customer_reviews.author: Tony sims

customer_reviews.title: product is awesome. Clean a lot of fish and it does ...
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly, product is awesome. Clean a lot of fish and it does a very good job!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It worked great and the blades were a fine addition to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best electric knife we have ever had! A blade for every occasion!! So far, so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fillet Away
customer_reviews.text: This knife is excellent. All five of us bought them after we tried them out. We fillet mostly crappie and bluegill, and an occasional cat fish, so please no questions about filleting sail fish, great whites or whales. I also purchased a second knife for the home to slice ham, roast and poultry. I still have the Mr. Twister that is a good knife for the price and have used them for years, so if money is tight, Mr. T is still a good option. Ladies if your looking for that special gift for your angler or meat carver, this will score you points. Melvin P Thorpe aka Commander Crappie
customer_reviews.author: Melvin P Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Mostly a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Have cleaned approx. 200 fish and it mostly worked very well. Am having trouble with the trigger occasionally sticking which could be hazardous to your fingers. Maybe got it fixed with some silicone spray. Also long blades don't fit in mesh carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: loisgressneal

customer_reviews.title: The 2 sets of longer blades are bent when using ...
customer_reviews.text: The 2 sets of longer blades are bent when using them they get meat between and will not cut. Plenty of power. Just wish the blades where straight.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mcgonnell

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We have cleaned a lot of fish with it. Works great. Used it while putting up corn too.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce's2cents

customer_reviews.title: great for redfish
customer_reviews.text: This electric knife has enough torque to filet redfish cleanly. The assortment of blades makes it very versatile and effective.
customer_reviews.author: L. Germany

customer_reviews.title: He is happy to have this brand of electric knife
customer_reviews.text: A gift for husband. He is happy to have this brand of electric knife. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: very strong motor not like the one I use to cut the turkey
customer_reviews.text: Only used it on Walleye so far, very strong motor not like the one I use to cut the turkey, You can bet this Thanksgiving I will be using my Angler Pro on the turkey. It's an awesome knife with plenty of kick.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Works great no problems with it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! We fish alot and clean alot of fish. Works great no problems with it. Couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Rees

customer_reviews.title: I like to fillet my fish so there are no bones ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding electric knife. I like to fillet my fish so there are no bones and this knife cuts through them like butter.
customer_reviews.author: MLS

customer_reviews.title: trigger pushes to hard
customer_reviews.text: I have had many electric knives and none of them did you have to push half this hard, this is not a comfortable knife to use. I was trying to upgrade my old American angler which still works, thinking this would be similar and it is close other than the trigger. I clean a lot of panfish and this thing would give me carpal tunnel. I read a review were someone else was complaining about this problem, but I thought well I have fairly strong hands so it should not be problem for me, but this thing is just not user-friendly. It is too bad because it would be a great knife otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Dale F.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These knives do not hold up for more than a week. Do not but these
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great with no problem
customer_reviews.text: Works great with no problem. I love the shark blades that glide through the rib bones of the fish.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Reed

customer_reviews.title: nice knife
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several knives over the last 2 -3 years and none have held up to the red fish. sheep heads/blacks & reds are a few of the tougher fish to clean with the common electric knife. speckled trout are very easy to fillet-thin skinned fish. this knife so far has held up to every expectation i had. the camp we bought a year ago had a 4-5 year old American Angler left in the cleaning room. our conversational knives for the 5th or 6th time burnt up. grabbed the old American Angler finished cleaning fish and it is still working today. very good product. thanks
customer_reviews.author: allen johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of very few to last two seasons of cleaning hundred of lbs. of off shore fish
customer_reviews.author: james mcpherson

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use I does get warm after 6or 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use I does get warm after 6or 7 fish but its beats using a knife I like no problems so far .
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy's Bait Shop

customer_reviews.title: This knife works very good for me
customer_reviews.text: This knife works very good for me. I fish lake erie and catch a lot of perch and walleye pike, and the American angler pro electric fillet knife works effectively and lasts longer than many other fillet knives I"ve used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M Gaul

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This knife is just right for all our needs works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Knife Ever
customer_reviews.text: The American Angler is the best knife out there..I have three of them..2 older blue and yellow knifes and this one..we literately clean lots and lots of fish a year...lake Erie walleyes are big with huge bones...and this knife holds up to the abuse of constant cleaning fish every day..we clean black suckers every spring... white bass ect....it is a very good working knife.....Thanks Nick
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Worked fast
customer_reviews.text: Worked fast and as good as I was hoping. Was as described and well worth the price so not to have to filet fish with just a filet knife. Made short work of a mess of fish!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Shelton

customer_reviews.title: best all around knife I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: best all around knife I have ever used . I can fillet a small kroaker with no bones with th tiger shark blade
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B.

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I don't know how the other electric fillet knife companies stay in biz.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Prather

customer_reviews.title: Not the sharpest tool in the box
customer_reviews.text: We fish Lake Erie for perch and walleye, mostly perch. This knife is much harder to get nice fillets around the ribs compared to the Rapala's I have had. The blades seem too thick and dull. Not what I expected from the makers of 'GINSU' knives. The cheap bag does not protect the blades at all. It seems to have a little more power, only time will tell if it lasts longer than the Rapala's. Jury is still out on whether I think the high cost is worth more than treating the Rapala's as disposable.
customer_reviews.author: VMorg

customer_reviews.title: Received a used product with blood on it!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly unhappy. I purchased a brand new fillet knife and received a used one with fish blood inside and on one of the blades. Incredibly unacceptable. This should never happen.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent motor and very sharp blades that filleted my fish with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item very heavy and my wife says too large for her hand. This is a man's knife.
customer_reviews.author: David Orcutt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT KNIFE!!!!!! WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: great knife,using it to fillet fish,would recommend this product for any type of cutting, five different blades handles all of your need's.
customer_reviews.author: tony resendez

customer_reviews.title: Best Filet Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is the best filet knife we have ever owned. We filet a lot of fish and have not found one that works as well as this one. We will recommend it to all of our friends
customer_reviews.author: Becky Schambaugh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked better than the one I used to swear by
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The fillet knife was exactly what my husband wanted, primarily for wallet, bass, and northerns. It is already in the boat!
customer_reviews.author: M.Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Met all of my requirements, went thru scores of ...
customer_reviews.text: Met all of my requirements, went thru scores of Walleye and Perch without any problems. Numerous knives is a huge benefit. Can't wait to try it on Salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Mike/Greta Wittmeier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best electric knife I ever used and comes with five sets of blades
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: American Angler Pro
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to use knife until now,works great. I hope it will last as long as my old American Angler 11 years of hard use.
customer_reviews.author: benny evans

customer_reviews.title: If you would like an all around knife you will select this
customer_reviews.text: Experienced anglers have thier own secret knife for filleting fish. I watched a charter captain use this knife and I found it on Amazon. If you would like an all around knife you will select this. You can fillet a 20 pound salmon or 2 pound walley in the same time. Amazon is becomming my go to outfitter.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Carboneau

customer_reviews.title: Sharp & Fast
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and very fast. Cleaned 20 Crappie & 4 Walleye in about 10 minutes! Best electric knife I have used.
customer_reviews.author: R. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Teriffic knife
customer_reviews.text: If you buy any other brand electric filet knife you will buy 3-4 before you come close to wearing this one out. Do the arithmetic.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen Furr

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my husband, as while at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, as while at the fish cleaning station, a gentleman told us that he would never use anything but, a little more pricey but top in quality&function!! Would definately buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle W.

customer_reviews.title: where has this knife been
customer_reviews.text: Knife second to none!!!!! Very smooth on big redfish. People fight at camp now to clean fish. Thanks American Angler
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fishing guide and have been using these knifes ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fishing guide and have been using these knifes for over a year. The strongest motor and gears I've ever used, and I have used many different models. Is there anything for sale for sharpening the blades? I've never had any luck and that is the life of a knife.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy the best........
customer_reviews.text: This is the best electric knife in the world today.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Sacramento, CA, USA

customer_reviews.title: Heard nothing but good things about the actual knife
customer_reviews.text: I too ordered a new knife and received one with blood inside of knife. Even the blades had scratches where they had rubbed against themselves. Heard nothing but good things about the actual knife, but buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It is a wonderful knife and the reason I didn't give it 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful knife and the reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it cost so much. I have bought many electric knives over the years and never paid anywhere near to that much but it is a good knife and I am glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Dale Rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best knife on the market...,and I have burnt them all up
customer_reviews.author: Gary Falgout

product_meta.title: American Angler PRO Professional Grade Electric Fillet Knife Sportsmen's Kit – 110 Volt High Performance Ergonomic Motorized Handset with Five Kinds of Stainless Steel Blades, 32352DS
product_meta.description: American Angler's newest electric fillet knife, the PRO EFK, is our most powerful knife yet. With 2X the torque and smooth and consistent filleting, the only thing slowing this knife down is how long it takes to land your catch. This product includes 5 blades: (1) 10" Saltwater Blade, (1) 5.5" Curved Tip Blade Replacement, (1) 8" Curved Tip Blade Replacement, (1) 10" Heavy Duty Shark Blade Replacement and (1) 8" Heavy Duty Shark Blade Replacement.
feature_bullets: Fillet with Ease: The PRO Series motor boasts 2X more torque than any other "Heavy-Duty" EFK so big bones never slow you down.
Fillet Season After Season: Superior Drive Train components and design gives the PRO Series 4X the lifespan of any other "Heavy-Duty" EFK
Fillet Comfortably: Advanced airflow design keeps the PRO Series ergonomic handset cool for hours of continuous filleting.
Fillet like a PRO: Commercial Fisherman and Guide Services choose the American Angler PRO Series more than any other EFK. Backed by a 2-Year Limited Lifetime Warranty.

Fillet to Perfection:The EFK PRO series handset is compatible with all variations of American Angler Replacement including the 8-Inch Curved Replacement Blade (31018DS) and the 8-Inch Curved Replacement Shark Blade (31018DS).
Fillet with Ease: The PRO Series motor boasts 2X more torque than any other "Heavy-Duty" EFK so big bones never slow you down.
Fillet Season After Season: Superior Drive Train components and design gives the PRO Series 4X the lifespan of any other "Heavy-Duty" EFK
Fillet Comfortably: Advanced airflow design keeps the PRO Series ergonomic handset cool for hours of continuous filleting.

Fillet to Perfection: The EFK PRO series handset is compatible with all variations of American Angler Replacement including the 8-Inch Curved Replacement Blade (31018DS) and the 8-Inch Curved Replacement Shark Blade (31018DS) Blades so you always have the perfect blade to fillet your catch.
Fillet like a PRO: Commercial Fisherman and Guide Services choose the American Angler PRO Series more than any other EFK. Backed by a 2-Year Limited Lifetime Warranty.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
